tool_description: Detailed technical specifications on tens of thousands of motorcycle models. See more info at https://api-ninjas.com/api/motorcycles.
name: Motorcycles by API-Ninjas
title: Motorcycles by API-Ninjas

api_list.name: /v1/motorcycles
api_list.description:
API Ninjas Motorcycles API endpoint. Returns up to 30 motorcycle results matching the input name parameters. For searches that yield > 30 results, please use the offset parameter.

Either **make** or **model** parameter must be set.

optional_parameters.name: model
optional_parameters.description: name of motorcycle model. Supports partial matching (e.g. Ninja will match Ninja 650).

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description: number of results to offset for pagination. Default is 0.

optional_parameters.name: make
optional_parameters.description: name of manufacturer/brand. Supports partial matching (e.g. Harley will match Harley-Davidson).

optional_parameters.name: year
optional_parameters.description: release year of motorcycle model. Must be in the form of YYYY (e.g. 2022).
